ygData.subject: Re: Stupid
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/99 10:05:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time, cjbuhl@uswnvg.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/99 10:05:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
cjbuhl@... writes:

<<
Today I got to read about idiot A's Laptop problems (I don't give a f'in
crap)
>>

Ouch, I guess I am idiot A - lol!!!

Actually, I think my post was somewhat relevant if not entirely so, to this
list. Being able to play EQ while on a business trip with a laptop seems to
me to be a great "Cheat" if not in the same sense that we normally consider
what is "Cheat" is. Anyway, the laptop thread that I started also led to
another great "cheat", the ability to transfer your hotkey preference to
another server. Does that information bother you!!! Is that not a "cheat"?

Many people have helpfully responded to my laptop inquiry and of the 12 or so
posts so far, you are the first to complain. Sorry I offended you so much.
I have been a regular contributor to this list and will continue to be
despite your admonitions.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
aka - Idiot A :)
